svg.text: JES BIM CRM ‚Äî Data Flow Diagram (v1)
Marketing (Data Gatherers + Campaign Manager) ‚Üí Sales (Outreach Escalation) ‚Üí Deal Conversion
Duplicate check by email ‚Üí Create new or Update existing
Sees new qualified leads ‚Üí Selects which to target
Extracts data (phone, emails, contacts) ‚Üí Classifies lead
Interested ‚Ä¢ Referred ‚Ä¢ BIM user ‚Ä¢ Not now
Sales rep contacts lead via LinkedIn ‚Ä¢ 15 day window
Sales rep calls the lead directly
Lead parked here for up to 6 months
Back to Data Gatherers for re-enrichment
Responded at any outreach step or SQL from AI
‚Ä¢ No Reply auto-forward to Sales: 15 days (editable)
‚Ä¢ Hot: 3 days ‚Ä¢ Warm: 7 days ‚Ä¢ Cold: 14 days (all editable)
‚Ä¢ Markets: Middle East (UAE, KSA), Dutch, German
‚Ä¢ Campaign Manager selects leads ‚Üí auto-pushed via API
‚Ä¢ Reads email ‚Üí Extracts phone, emails, contacts, details
‚Ä¢ SQL: Interested, referred, BIM user, "not now"
‚Ä¢ MQL: Not interested, OOO, future potential
‚Ä¢ Campaign Manager can override any classification
